'''"Team Spirit"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Team Spirit" is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

A faint light is emitted from the furnishing, and after leaving placement mode, a fire appears in the basin. The fire is decorative only and does not apply {{Pyro}}.

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Tunigi Hollow]]. This area of the map is unlocked during {{Quest|As the Khvarena's Light Shows}}.
